results.text: You can spot danger from a mile away, and this is no exception. You gain an expertise die to your next initiative roll.
Even the smallest movements catch your eye. You have advantage on your next Perception check.

Nothing escapes you. For the next minute you are able to read lips and understand what they are saying, so long as you know the language the creature is using (as in the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.10xyiadnukdy9xg9]{Intuitive} feat).
It’s not just your eyesight that’s on high alert. Choose either scent or hearing. You gain an expertise die on Perception checks made with that sense for the next hour.
For the next 24 hours you cannot be surprised except by magical means (such as an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4eidicv0lyqevtwd]{Invisibility} spell).

You are highly in-tune with your senses and surroundings, granting you a higher form of awareness. For the next hour you are under the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.i7sh0e2wqmql4cac]{See Invisibility} spell.
